content: With the help of his twin sister, Zeph is able to strengthen and maintain the illusion of peace in the empire, but at a great cost. As they work together, Kira begins to understand the weight of her newfound power and the responsibility that comes with it. Meanwhile, Eris grapples with her own loyalties as she is torn between her duty to her father and her love for her friends. The story follows the three friends as they navigate the political landscape of the empire and fight against powerful chaos creatures that threaten to tear the empire apart. They also discover the truth about their past and the secrets their parents have kept from them all along. Ultimately, the novel explores themes of loyalty, power, sacrifice, and the true cost of maintaining an empire.
